archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.3.6a: a) maintained in escrow by a trusted external party (e.g. a legal representative, lawyer or equivalent, who holds the application source code until fulfilment of a contract)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
